Add New Users#

Data processor#

class retentioneering.data_processors_lib.new_users.NewUsersEvents(params)[source]#

Creates new synthetic event for each user: new_user or existing_user.

Parameters:
new_users_listlist of int or list of str or all

If the list of user_ids is given - new_user event will be created for each user from the list. Event existing_user will be added to the rest of the users.

If all - new_user synthetic event will be created for all users from the input eventstream.

Returns:
Eventstream

Eventstream with new synthetic events one for each user:

event_name

event_type

timestamp

new_user

new_user

first_event

existing_user

existing_user

first_event
class retentioneering.data_processors_lib.new_users.NewUsersParams(*, new_users_list)[source]#

Class with parameters for class NewUsersEvents()

Eventstream#

NewUsersHelperMixin.add_new_users(new_users_list)[source]#

Method of Eventstream Class which creates one of synthetic events in each user’s path: new_user or existing_user. And adds them to the input eventstream.

Returns:
Eventstream

Input eventstream with new synthetic events.

Notes

See parameters and details of dataprocessor functionality retentioneering.data_processors_lib.new_users.NewUsersEvents()
